long_description: The Gerber Outrigger knife serves up fast action and light weight, packing reliable performance into a durable and handsome design. 7Cr17MoV stainless-steel blade features a satin finish and dual thumb studs for easy opening with either hand. Assisted Opening 2.0 ensures fast action; blade locks securely into place when open. Lightweight aluminum handle features a rubberized overmold grip for comfort and an open frame for additional weight savings. The Gerber Outrigger knife comes with a pocket clip.
short_description: The Gerber Outrigger knife serves up fast action and light weight, packing reliable performance into a durable and handsome design.
